name: Nanobyrinth
description:
Nanobyrinth started as an entry for LOWREZJAM 2021, which requires submissions to have a resolution of 64x64 pixels. Sadly, it wasn't finished in time. After a few months on the shelf, I decided to resurrect the project and finish it.


Game features
  • Over 100 unique rooms, randomly placed over a fixed 12x12 grid
  • Adaptive music that intensifies as the monster gets closer
  • Teleport system (step on it, if you dare...)
  • Original art, music, and sound effects

I hope you enjoy it!
